description: The Tulip Girls pride themselves in delivering the best, fresh floral arrangements in Sonoma County. project: Redemption House of the Bay Area
description: Redemption House is a multifaceted program established to assist survivors of human trafficking in getting back to a functional, productive, and healthy lifestyle.
Level-Up Arcade is a website with an intended audience for young adults that are looking for a nostalgic feel for retro video games. This website works on desktop, tablet, and mobile mediums
